steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fj5hp","text":"Set up the reaction mixtures with 1x kinase buffer (diluted from 10x kinase buffer),   LRRK2 or   Rab8 protein, for the reaction group add   ATP, and for the control add H2O instead, the total volume we used is  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":96,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":139,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":211,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"200","error_concentration":false,"guid":"6602E7001F7E11EDA8B5816EEBB6B756","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"753EE5701F7E11EDA8B5816EEBB6B756","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"7AA334D01F7E11EDA8B5816EEBB6B756","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"830979901F7E11EDA8B5816EEBB6B756","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
